query:
-- Buscar ID do pedido
SET @pedidoId = (SELECT id FROM pickingOrders WHERE orderNumber LIKE '%1771897309625%' LIMIT 1);

-- Verificar linhas em pickingOrderItems
SELECT 
    poi.id,
    poi.pickingOrderId,
    poi.productId,
    p.sku,
    poi.requestedQuantity,
    poi.inventoryId,
    i.batch
FROM pickingOrderItems poi
LEFT JOIN products p ON poi.productId = p.id
LEFT JOIN inventory i ON poi.inventoryId = i.id
WHERE poi.pickingOrderId = @pedidoId
ORDER BY poi.productId, i.batch;
